channel.title: Monster drops for runes (and possibly other drops).
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Monster drops for runes (and possibly other drops)." - Various monster drops for runes and possibly other drops

item.title: Monster drops for runes (and possibly other drops).
item.content:encoded:
I currently have:

Magical Wand - +1 Gen Strength
Plug Suit - +1 Gen Success

(Might consider trading Spirit of the Nine-Tailed Fox for many runes only will not trade for other monster drops.)

I'm primarily looking for runes. But will consider trading regular drops for the following other monster drops:

Fruits Basket
Go Piece
Groupies
Late Night Snack
Monkey Cymbals
Vampire Cloak

PM me in game to trade.
